rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel check.valid.2, improve illegal.all check
QCCR1E32188 SOAP Fault error message (scxmlapi(19)) received when adding a Favorite without appropriate rights in the profile
update the target of error message when user try to create public view without the authorization.
QCCR1E32188 SOAP Fault error message (scxmlapi(19)) received when adding a Favorite without appropriate rights in the profile
update the message when operator doesn't authority to create personal view,
update the message receiver to current login user.
